thread.section_title: Lanzerac Hotel & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely breakfast
thread.title_full: Lovely breakfast - Review of Lanzerac Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Cagrogers
title: Lovely breakfast
text:
We went here for breakfast on a Monday as we were battling to find a place open. Maybe trip advisor could setup a way of searching for place that are open on a Monday or just open on a particular day. It would have saved us some time.
We were not disappointed. Great service, great coffee, great setting and great food. And the best part is that there is a wine tasting hall right there with, wait for it, great wines.
We got there a little late so the grounds staff were busy cutting the lawn which was a little loud but they have to do it sometime. So I would suggest getting there at a normal breakfast time.
